text: The 2001 Algerian Cup Final was the 37th final of the Algerian Cup. The final took place on July 10, 2001, at Stade 5 Juillet 1962 in Algiers. USM Alger beat CR Mécheria 1-0 to win their 5th Algerian Cup. ==Pre-match== ===Details=== {| style="width:92%;" |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="200"| !! |- |GK||1 || Hichem Mezaïr |- |DF||4 || Fayçal Hamdani (c) |- |DF||18 || Rabah Deghmani |- |DF||5 || Mounir Zeghdoud |- |DF||3 || Tarek Ghoul |- |MF||10 || Hocine Achiou |- |MF||6 || Karim Ghazi |- |MF||- || Farid Djahnine || || |- |MF||- || Maouche |- |FW||7 || Azzedine Rahim || || |- |FW||17 || Tarek Hadj Adlane || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- |MF||-|| Saïd Baâzouz || || |- |DF||20|| Mahieddine Meftah || || |- |||-|| Galoul || || |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Noureddine Saâdi |} |valign="top"| |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="200"| !! |- |GK||- || Malfi |- |||- || L.Boudjemaa |- |||- || Salmi |- |||- || Benslimane |- |||- || Hadjadj |- |||- || Zoudji |- |||- || Rahouadj || || |- |||- || Belarbi || || |- |||- || Sebbane |- |||- || Kaddouche |- |||- || Djedidi || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- |||-|| Amrane || || |- |||-|| Ziane || || |- |||-|| Kebir || || |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Merabet |} |} {| width=100% style="font-size: 90%" | width=50% valign=top| MATCH OFFICIALS *Assistant referees: ** ** *Fourth official: ** MAN OF THE MATCH * Hocine Achiou (USM Alger) | style="width:50%; vertical-align:top;"| MATCH RULES * 90 minutes. * 30 minutes of extra-time if necessary. * Penalty shootout if scores still level. * Seven named substitutes. * Maximum of three substitutions. |} ==References== Cup Algeria Category:Algerian Cup Finals Category:USM Alger matches
title: 2001 Algerian Cup Final
